doc.name: Tutorial: Ask Watson what Twitter is telling you
doc.desc: A 4-part series with step-by-step instructions on how to build an app that gets data from Twitter and uses that data for cognitive insights through the IBM Watson services.

doc.name: Task: Translating to English with Mercury
doc.desc: Procedure to install and use a translation app.

doc.name: Reference: Vedic API
doc.desc: Complete documentation of a public API.

doc.name: Walkthrough: How to use an API
doc.desc: Written in a question-and-answer format, to show the data the API serves, and the possible uses of that data.
